content: Instant APIs from any JavaScript file or Node package.
title: First Release of RESTUtils Host

content: More than likely you’re here for the RESTUtils Host; a small utility that instantly converts any JavaScript library or Node package into a web-based REST API. Here’s a quick video showing how to use it: Should you run into any snags, or have questions, feel free to reach out: info@restutils.com Until then, have a great day! Thanx, Fred
title: First Release of RESTUtils Host
